autodse.explorer.explorer¶

The main module of explorer.

class autodse.explorer.explorer.AccurateExplorer(db: autodse.database.Database, evaluator: autodse.evaluator.evaluator.Evaluator, tag: str, points: List[Dict[str, Union[str, int]]])¶

Currently we simply evaluate all given points and mark the best one. The future opportunities here could be an algorithm for tuning design tool parameters.

points¶

A set of points to be explored.

run(algo_config: Dict[str, Any]) → None¶

The main function of the explorer to launch the search algorithm.

Parameters

  • algo_name -- The corresponding algorithm name for running this exploration.

  • algo_config -- The configurable values for the algorithm.

class autodse.explorer.explorer.Explorer(db: autodse.database.Database, evaluator: autodse.evaluator.evaluator.Evaluator, tag: str)¶

Main explorer class.

db¶

The result database.

evaluator¶

The evaluator.

tag¶

The string tag of this explorer.

algo_log_file_name¶

The prefix name of log file.

log¶

Logger object.

best_result¶

So far best result.

explored_point¶

So far explored point.

create_job_and_apply_point(point) → Optional[autodse.result.Job]¶

Create a new job and apply the given design point.

Parameters

point -- The point to be applied.

Returns

The created job, or None if failed.

run(algo_config: Dict[str, Any]) → None¶

The main function of the explorer to launch the search algorithm.

Parameters

  • algo_name -- The corresponding algorithm name for running this exploration.

  • algo_config -- The configurable values for the algorithm.

update_best(result: autodse.result.Result) → None¶

Keep tracking the best result found in this explorer.

Parameters

result -- The new result to be checked.

class autodse.explorer.explorer.FastExplorer(db: autodse.database.Database, evaluator: autodse.evaluator.evaluator.Evaluator, timeout: int, tag: str, ds: Dict[str, autodse.parameter.DesignParameter])¶

Fast explorer uses serach algorithm to find the best point in a large design space. For each explored point, it runs level 1 and level 2 evaluation to get an estimated QoR in a relative short time.

timeout¶

Timeout in seconds for each job evaluation.

ds¶

The given design space.

run(algo_config: Dict[str, Any]) → None¶

The main function of the explorer to launch the search algorithm.

Parameters

  • algo_name -- The corresponding algorithm name for running this exploration.

  • algo_config -- The configurable values for the algorithm.
